scripts.test: npx hardhat test --show-stack-traces && yarn beep || yarn beep
scripts.seed: npx hardhat run scripts/trusted-seeder-remote.ts --network ftm_mainnet && yarn beep || yarn beep
scripts.execute-queued-timelock-txs: npx hardhat run scripts/execute-queued-timelock-transactions.ts --network ftm_mainnet && yarn beep || yarn beep
scripts.queue-sync-farms: npx hardhat run scripts/timelocked-update-pools-from-config.ts --network ftm_mainnet && yarn beep || yarn beep
scripts.run-misc-runnable: npx hardhat run scripts/misc-runnable.ts --network ftm_mainnet && yarn beep || yarn beep
scripts.coverage: npx hardhat coverage && yarn beep || yarn beep
scripts.deploy-bsc-testnet: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-testnet.ts --network bsc_testnet && yarn beep || yarn beep
scripts.export-bsc-testnet-addresses: npx hardhat run scripts/export-addresses.ts --network bsc_testnet && yarn beep || yarn beep
scripts.deploy-fantom-v2: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-ftm-v2.ts --network ftm_mainnet && yarn beep || yarn beep
scripts.queue-timelock-txs: npx hardhat run scripts/queue-timelock-transactions.ts --network ftm_mainnet && yarn beep || yarn beep
